short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome DevTools for developing with vendOS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use vendOS Devtools to create and interact with a virtual instance of a vending machine running vendOS.

Users should use this while developing apps for vendOS hardware, it makes it much easier to see how the machine works and allows you to push straight to the machine knowing that it will function in exactly the same way.

Please refer to our documentation on how to use them in conjunction with our JS library.
